title: Sleeping with Patty Hearst
description: As America debates its most famous kidnapping case of the 1970s, a divided family in North Carolina copes with its own missing person. Lily Stokes searches for her half sister with help from her mothers boyfriend, a freewheeling man who likes Lily a little too much. While keeping secrets at home and then escaping into an odd marriage, Lily takes an imaginative look at her mothers notorious past and her sister s surprising future. Sleeping with Patty Hearst is a gripping coming-of-age story with edge and heart.
author: Mary Lambeth Moore
